description: Try our easy to follow Zucchini "Bacon" recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Zucchini "Bacon" Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.
Combine oil, soy sauce, maple syrup and paprika in a small bowl. Season with pepper.

Using a vegetable peeler or mandolin set on the thinnest setting, slice zucchini into long, thin strips. Place zucchini strips on prepared trays in a single layer, being careful not to overlap any. Brush each slice of zucchini with sauce mixture, then turn slices over and brush other sides.

Cook zucchini for 15 minutes, then remove from the oven and turn slices over. Return to the oven and bake for a further 8-10 minutes or until golden. Serve in toasted brioche buns topped with a fried egg, rocket leaves and tomato chutney.
